item.title: Example 2.1: Package Creation
item.description: Example 2.1: Package creation      This example is also available on YouTube. Introduction Packages are the way MeVisLab organizes different development projects. Macro modules and projects are stored in packages. If you like to create a global macro module, you need a package in which this macro module can be stored in. In this chapter, we will create our own package. We start our package creation by creating a package group, because every package needs to be stored in a package group.
